title: Authors and Citation
text: Nasri (2024). ggfootball: Plotting Football Stats. R package version 0.0.0.9000, http://aymennasri./ggfootball/, https://github.com/aymennasri/ggfootball.
code: @Manual{,   title = {ggfootball: Plotting Football Stats},   author = {Aymen Nasri},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000, http://aymennasri.me/ggfootball/},   url = {https://github.com/aymennasri/ggfootball}, }

title: Plotting Football Stats
text: R package plotting understat data; xG chart shot map.

title: Plotting Football Stats
text: can install development version ggfootball GitHub :

title: Plotting Football Stats
code: library(ggfootball)  # xG chart xg_chart(match_id = 26631,           home_team_color = "red",           away_team_color = "grey",           competition = "Premier League")  # Shot/xG map shot_map(match_id = 26631, title = "Shot Map")

what: Plot shots from a football match — shot_map
title: Plot shots from a football match — shot_map
text: Plot shots football match

title: Plot shots from a football match — shot_map
Plot shots from a football match — shot_map
text: match_id Desired match ID understat.com title Plot title; empty default

title: Plot shots from a football match — shot_map
text: Interactive ggiraph plot displaying teams shots side side printed Viewer.

title: Plot shots from a football match — shot_map
code: shot_map(26631, title = "xG Map") #> Error in check_gfonts(errors = TRUE): package 'gfonts' is required to download fonts from 'fonts.google'.

title: xG chart plotting — xg_chart
text: xG chart plotting

title: xG chart plotting — xg_chart
code: xg_chart(   match_id,   home_team_color,   away_team_color,   competition = "Premier League" )

title: xG chart plotting — xg_chart
text: match_id Match ID understat.com home_team_color Color used home team away_team_color Color used away team competition Competition name subtitle; defaults "Premier League"

title: xG chart plotting — xg_chart
text: Interactive highcharter plot displaying xG chart teams.

title: xG chart plotting — xg_chart
code:
